item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description:
"But love is always new. Regardless of whether we love once, twice, or a dozen times in our life, we always face a brand-new situation. Love can consign us to hell or to paradise, but it always takes us somewhere. We simply have to accept it, because it is what nourishes our existence. If we reject it, we die of hunger, because we lack the courage to stretch out a hand and pluck the fruit from the branches of the tree of life. We have to take love where we find it, even if that means hours, days, weeks of disappointment and sadness.
The moment we begin to seek love, love begins to seek us. And to save us." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we meet someone and fall in love, we have a sense that the whole universe is on our side. And yet if something goes wrong, there is nothing left! How is it possible for the beauty that was there only minutes before to vanish so quickly? Life moves very fast. It rushes from heaven to hell in a matter of seconds." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What is a teacher? I'll tell you: it isn't someone who teaches something, but someone who inspires the student to give of her best in order to discover what she already knows." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "This is what we call love. When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there's no need at all to understand what's happening, because everything happens within you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When someone leaves, it's because someone else is about to arrive." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "In real life, love has to be possible. Even if it is not returned right away, love can only survive when the hope exists that you will be able to win over the person you desire." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worst kind of suffering." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Sometimes you have to be apart from people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "When we lose one blessing, another is often most unexpectedly given in its place." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Science and religion are not at odds. Science is simply too young to understand." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "Paths are made by walking" -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Stay mad, but behave like normal people. Run the risk of being different, but learn to do so without attracting attention." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Kadang-kadang langit bisa kelihatan seperti lembar kosong. Padahal sebenarnya tidak. Bintang kamu tetap di sana. Bumi hanya sedang berputar." -- Dee

item.title: Putroeline add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "You gotta find what you like and let it kill you." -- Charles Bukowski
